Title: Allows public employee organizations an opportunity to reconsider and re-vote on a written agreement that was initially voted down
Summary: Allows public employee organizations an opportunity to reconsider and re-vote on a written agreement that was initially voted down.
LawCode: Amd §§201, 209 & 209-a, Civ Serv L; amd §12-306, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the ratification of a written agreement between a public employer and an employee organization
